comments.author: Josh
comments.message:
This was a fun read, lots of great stuff this past year.

How did you dig up all those tweets? Did you use some app or just go scrolling back through your twitter feed?

replies.author: zachleat
replies.message: Thanks! Most of the tweets I found through http://favstar.fm/

replies.author: zachleat
replies.message: Oh, I forgot to mention a better resource for this: https://ads.twitter.com has an analytics section.
